timeline.bodyText: @holtgrewe Thanks for the PR! Why should this one be #{null}? Is that the same as empty string? Like why should this value have to be different from the other saml example values?
timeline.author: inodb

replies.bodyText: ah i see never mind, you put it in the description, for keeping the old behavior. Makes sense
replies.author: inodb
inodb

timeline.message:
Further documenting "#{null}" value.

Co-Authored-By: Ino de Bruijn <ino@ino.bio>

timeline.bodyText:
curious, would this btw work?

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                            <b:property name="entityBaseURL" value="${saml.sp.metadata.entitybaseurl}"/>
          
          
            
                            <b:property name="entityBaseURL" value="${saml.sp.metadata.entitybaseurl:#{null}}"/>
timeline.author: inodb
